p.e:
2045 TAKES PLACE ON EARTH IN THE YEAR 2045,
YOU AND YOUR GROUPS WILL PARTAKE IN A VARIETY
OF MISSIONS, FROM SOLVING CRIMES TO BAKING
COOKIES, THERE'S MANY POSSIBILITIES 

PERFORMING ACTIONS SUCH AS ATTACKING,
CLIMBING, ETC. WILL FORCE YOU TO ROLL A
D20, THE SUCCESS CAN ALSO BE AFFECTED
BY YOUR SKILLS. FOR EXAMPLE, IF YOU WANT TO
CLIMB A WALL AND YOU HAVE "CLIMBING" AS
ONE OF YOUR SKILLS, THE MINIMUM NUMBER
TO SUCCESSFULY CLIMB THAT WALL WILL BE
LOWER. HOW MUCH LOWER? THIS IS ENTIRELY
DECIDED BY THE GM

BY ROLEPLAYING, YOU ARE GIVEN RP TOKENS,
THESE TOKENS CAN GIVE YOU ADVANTAGES
SUCH AS RE-ROLLS AND OTHER BONUSES.
IF YOU HAVE A NEGATIVE TRAIT LIKE "STUPID"
AND YOU MAKE BAD DESCISIONS OUT OF
CHARACTER, YOU MAY BE REWARDED WITH
RP TOKENS
